welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ocean Springs, a charming coastal town known for its beautiful beaches, delicious seafood, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the hidden gems this city has to offer. Happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jackson County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Jackson County Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gulfport-Biloxi International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gulfport-Biloxi International Airport is used for general aviation and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network 'GPT Free WiFi'.
